feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: She had been a little frightened, both by Miss Lavish and by Mr. Eager, she knew not why.
feels.exactPlace: In the newspaper-room at the English bank

feels.name: Rebellion
feels.quote: For the first time Lucy’s rebellious thoughts swept out in words—for the first time in her life.
feels.exactPlace: In the newspaper-room at the English bank

feels.name: Confusion
feels.quote: Lucy was recalled to her manners, and after a little exertion the complacency of Mr. Eager was restored.
feels.exactPlace: In the newspaper-room at the English bank

feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: Lucy stood by the central table, trying to answer, or at least to formulate the questions rioting in her brain.
feels.exactPlace: In the newspaper-room at the English bank

Places.name: Newspaperroom_at_the_English_bank
Places.description: A room with a central table and newspapers like Punch and the Graphic.
